div.p: There’s 4 children, I’m the middle child, single parent family... Yeah hard times but we came through. I think a lot of influence, obviously education
was key; my mum had us quite young so that’s always been something that I’ve always thought about you know getting a career
and setting myself up, laying foundations before having my own children so and also because she was a single parent and she did so much
it was also giving us the drive to be go-getters I guess and we don’t let anything hold us back so we have got that whole fighting mentality
My mother has always done things like that fit around children so it could be like cleaning, bar work, now she’s nursing as qualified so
we’re proud of her for that because she’s gone back and retrained so yeah...
